Doing the following gave me some improvement:

KMP_SETTINGS=1 KMP_BLOCKTIME=0 KMP_AFFINITY=granularity=fine,verbose,compact,1,0 OMP_NUM_THREADS=72 python models/tutorials/image/mnist/convolutional.py
